item.title: Myapproach
item.description: What is SRE SRE measures how reliable my serivice is from my customer’s perspective, not from my perspective. It seems most of the talks use current or historic data, logs, Why we do not estimate future data then ? The reason is that usually you take generated logs, so it is hard to have a real-time observations. How to have real-time observations? how to estimate the future?
